title: Strike Force Five: Is This The Worst Podcast Ever?!
description:
The late-night hosts Jimmy Kimmel, Jimmy Fallon, Stephen Colbert, John Oliver, and Seth Meyers dropped a trailer for their new podcast, Strike Force 5, and it’s hella cringy.

Is This The G@yest Podcast Ever?! www.youtube.com

title: Beef is for the boys! 50% of US beef is eaten by only 12% of Americans... and most of that is dudes
description:
Fellaaaaaaas! Take a bow. In research that I'm sure is meant for Leftists to have an excuse to take our meat away, 50% is the US beef supply is eaten by only twelve percent of Americans. And it's mostly men doing all the beef eating! What's ironic is that when Tool Man Tim sent me this article, I had just put a brisket in the refrigerator to defrost.

In this new research via the New York Post.

title: Jimmy Buffett, iconic singer of "Margaritaville," passes away at age 76
description:
This was sucky news to wake up to. Jimmy Buffett's family announced that the pirate has passed away at age 76. The iconic singer of "Margaritaville," "Come Monday," and my personal favorite "Why Don't We Get Drunk" left this life surrounded by his family, friends, music, and dogs. "He lived his life like a song till the very last breath and will be missed beyond measure by many."

— (@)
